description: This Kotlin source file defines a Jetpack Compose UI for a login screen. It includes composable functions for managing login state, rendering the login form, and handling user interactions, with custom styling and theme-related color definitions. The file also bridges a ViewModel-based state management approach with Compose UI.

methods.name: rememberLoginState
methods.description: Bridges the LoginViewModel's observer-based state into Compose state, enabling reactive UI updates.

methods.name: LoginScreen
methods.description: Renders the login form UI, manages user inputs, and displays login status and errors.
